name: Chicken Fajitas with Bell Peppers and Onions
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add sliced chicken breast to the skillet and cook until no longer pink, about 6-8 minutes.
Add the bell peppers and onions to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Sprinkle chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper over the chicken and vegetables. Stir well to combine.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the spices are well incorporated and fragrant.
Warm the whole wheat tortillas in a separate pan or in the microwave.
Serve the chicken and vegetable mixture on the warm tortillas.
Top with salsa and Greek yogurt if desired.
description: A flavorful and nutritious meal featuring seasoned chicken, colorful bell peppers, and onions served on whole wheat tortillas. Perfect for a balanced and satisfying dinner.
additional_notes: For a gluten-free option, use corn tortillas instead of whole wheat tortillas. You can also add avocado slices or shredded cheese for extra flavor.
